title: EquaCode: A Multi-Strategy Jailbreak Approach for Large Language Models via Equation Solving and Code Completion
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: Large language models (LLMs), such as ChatGPT, have achieved remarkable success across a wide range of fields.
